definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: We deeply appreciate Russia's expression of solidarity with India at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我們非常感謝俄羅斯此時此刻對印度表達的團結精神。

sentences.english: Working on step three, at this point, would be foolish.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，致力於第三步是很愚蠢的。

sentences.english: There was a hell of a lot of maybes in my life at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，我的生活中都是“也許”，真是邪乎。

sentences.english: I think that at the present moment He is in the neighbourhood of Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 我想此時此刻，他應該在耶路撒冷的附近地區。

sentences.english: Putting a period for my naive, which means that I've striked forward to my maturity.
sentences.chinese: 爲曾經的幼稚畫上句號，此時此刻我走向了成熟。

sentences.english: Although the words are quite good, can chapter pure station at this moment where hear to go in?
sentences.chinese: 話雖不錯，可章清亭此時此刻哪裏聽得進去？

sentences.english: The light that provides love and security is available to you here and now.
sentences.chinese: 提供愛與安全的光芒在此時此刻對你們已經垂手可得。

sentences.english: They are simply based more on the past than on the here-and-now.
sentences.chinese: 只是移情和反移情更多是基於過去而非此時此刻。

sentences.english: Breathe in the love instilled into this speck of time and creation.
sentences.chinese: 吸進溶於此時此刻的萬物之愛。

sentences.english: I'm a practicing physician trying to help people here and now.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名此時此刻只想治病救人的執業醫師。

sentences.english: At this moment, Ms Ling Xiaoming contemplated a lot.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，凌曉明的內心更是心潮澎湃。

sentences.english: At this moment, we should not panic, you have to have a tranquil quiet of mind.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，要處變不驚，就得有一份安謐寧靜的心態。

sentences.english: But by then, Lee and his men had crossed safely back into Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 但此時此刻，李將軍及其殘部已安全抵達弗吉尼亞。

sentences.english: Could Sir Thomas look in upon us just now, he would bless himself.
sentences.chinese: 要是此時此刻托馬斯爵士能看見我們，會把他氣壞的。

sentences.english: Shihuai At this moment I do not know how to feel.
sentences.chinese: 吥知茹何釋懷此時此刻旳惢情。

sentences.english: At this moment, only endless thoughts in that dry die in a prison of the branches swaying.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，惟有無盡的思念在那枯瘐的枝頭搖曳。

definition: to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
